TextView.android:text: Ultrasound Machine with Monitor , Probe, Pick up Assembly for Bovine
Stereo Zoom Microscope (trinocular with camera - 1 and 1 without camera)
Gas Analyser (with probe for CO2, O2, temperature and RH)
Budgetary provision for salary made available by S/G; Quantum of funds made available annually (if not source of funding)
Sourcing of donor animals (breeding tract/ PT registered/ PS registered/CHRS registered/livestock market/ middlemen)
Sourcing of recipient animals (breeding tract/registered/PS registered/CHRS registered/livestock market/ middlemen)
Stage of donor animals (Heifers/in which lactation)
Infrastructure facilities for donor and recipient animals
Whether sex sorted semen used for fertilization
Whether data on IVF uploaded on Bharat Pashudhan data base (check from Portal) if not reasons there for
